response.job_title: Customer and Tech Support - Administrative Assistant - Tourism Guide
response.summary: Experienced bilingual tour guide with a demonstrated history of working in the travel & tourism industry. Colombian coffee region expert with a passion for local single origin coffees.
response.skills: Graphic Design, English, Coffee, Guided Tours, Interpreting, Electricity, Electrical Wiring, Electrical Technology, Adventure Travel, Graphics, Tourism, Traducción, Español, Inglés como lengua extranjera, Soporte técnico, Microsoft Excel, Microsoft Office, Servicio de atención al cliente, JIRA, CorelDRAW

profile_positions.location: Santa Rosa de Cabal, Risaralda, Colombia
profile_positions.description: I kept updated the customers info for processing the insurances through the daily activities (transportation, tours, hotels). Lead tours for foreign tourists (North America, Europe, Asia and Australia) showing and teaching the Colombian Coffee Culture by direct contact on experiences like collecting, selecting and tasting at Coffee region farms. Also about the Snowed Mountains National Park and all the Paramo environment.
profile_positions.title: Adventure Travel Specialist

profile_positions.description: Provide accurate and fast resolution on Technical and Customer support on services and Apps; through several channels (Call, Chat and Email) , on specialized platforms (Salesforce, JIRA) support for companies like Walmart, Southwest Vacations, Cheap Caribbean.

profile_positions.location: Santa Rosa de Cabal, Risaralda, Colombia
profile_positions.description: I created and processed daily formats (Excel and Word) about the activities (Coffee sales, inventory, customers and guests data base, suppliers). I filed and organized all the hotel activities documentation to the Account Manager based on the legal standard. I developed a better method to educate about the Coffee culture reaching 20% of good reviews on platforms like Tripadvisor and Google maps.
profile_positions.title: Administrative Assistant and Lead Tourguide (Coffee Tour)

profile_positions.description: Provide customer Service and Technical Support for companies like DirecTV and AT&T, as: modifying services on specialized platforms, performing troubleshooting process for customer’s devices satellite and data services

profile_positions.description: Designing flyers and Ads (Instagram, Whatsapp and Facebook) for clients using mostly Photoshop and CorelDRAW.

profile_positions.description: Visit users to educate them about the change and installation for the new energy service measurement devices according to RETIE standards. profile_positions.title: Electrical Systems Technician
